Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    CraftedWeapon
    Craft a new WeaponItem with the given parameters.
    CraftWeaponAction
    Action that enables conversion of one weapon into another
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Garage
    Ground that can only be entered by the Player A Vehicle is added here so it can only be used by the Player and other actors cannot block it.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    PickUpBehaviour
    Behaviour meant to be used by Zombie class Enable Zombies to pickup a weapon at their current location, if it is able to
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    RisingFromTheDead  
    TravelAction
    Action which moves the actor to another map.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    Vehicle
    Vehicle which gives the actor an option to move to another map
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieArm
    Weapon meant to be dropped by zombies, can be picked up by anyone, can be crafted into a better version if in the Player's inventory for an amount of turns.
    ZombieLeg
    Weapon meant to be dropped by zombies, can be picked up by anyone, can be crafted into a better version if in the Player's inventory for an amount of turns.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WeaponStats
    Class used to store and retrieve weapon data.
    ZombieCapability
